User commands help (.help)
.whoiamDetailed information about character.
.cfgUser settings.
.repairRepair other character from current account.
.offlineStart offline trading.
.lockLock character over IP/HWID.
.passwordChange account password.
.autohpEnable automatic use items restores HP.
.autompEnable automatic use items restores MP.
.autocpEnable automatic use items restores CP.
.hellboundHellbound level and confidence.
